title: Opening Title Sequence | AHS: Red Tide (Double Feature - Part 1)
author: AHS Crave
comment: Only true AHS fans can separate the Murder House, Asylum and Coven opening from each other 🤞🏻
The Asylum theme makes me remember how there was Aliens involved in season 2 so is there a connection perhaps? Especially considering the fact the little girl is named ‘Alma’
I had the little hope that Frances Conroy was going to get the "And"
i love that they reused the AHS asylum intro for this season
this is one of the strongest seasons i’ve watched since the first three. i hope they keep it up cause i’m throughly invested. it’s creepy and unique and amazing
description: American Horror Story: Double Feature (Part 1 - Red Tide) stars Sarah Paulson as Tuberculosis Karen, Evan Peters as Austin Sommers, Lily Rabe as Doris Gardener, Finn Wittrock as Harry Gardener, Ryan Kiera Armstrong as Alma Gardener, Frances Conroy as Belle Noir, Billie Lourd as Lark, Leslie Grossman as Ursula, Adina Porter as Chief Burelson, Angelica Ross as The Chemist, Macaulay Culkin as Mickey, Denis O'Hare as Holden, and Robin Weigert as Martha. All rights belong to FX Networks and Ryan Murphy Television.
